ActorTracking.description: Supply chain participants and their interactions with entities (products, materials, batches, commodities)

activity_timestamp.description: When actor interacted with entity (product, material, batch, commodity)

actor_identifier.description: Organization identifier GLN LEI or VAT

actor_role.description: Role in supply chain using CBV Source/Destination types

certification_status.description: URI references to actor certifications ISO 9001 ISO 14001 organic fair trade

ActorTracking.title: ActorTracking

AggregationEvents.description: Packaging hierarchy operations extending EPCIS AggregationEvent

aggregation_event_id.description: Unique identifier for aggregation operation - aligns with EPCIS eventID

aggregation_event_id_value.description: Value holder for aggregation event ID

aggregation_location.description: GLN where operation occurred - aligns with EPCIS bizLocation

aggregation_timestamp.description: When packing/unpacking happened - aligns with EPCIS eventTime

aggregation_type.description: ADD for packing DELETE for unpacking - uses EPCIS Action directly

biz_step.description: Business step like packing commissioning etc - uses CBV directly

child_identifiers.description: Child EPCs being aggregated/disaggregated using EPCIS childEPCs structure

disposition.description: Business condition of aggregation - aligns with EPCIS disposition

parent_identifier.description: Container pallet or case EPC being packed/unpacked - aligns with EPCIS parentID

read_point.description: Specific read point where aggregation occurred - EPCIS readPoint

AggregationEvents.title: AggregationEvents

return_documentation.description: URI references to return authorization shipping labels RMA documents

return_location.description: Location where entities (products, materials, batches, commodities) can be returned - GLN identifier

return_method.description: How entity (product, material, batch, commodity) can be returned

disposal_certification.description: URI reference to disposal certification or compliance document

disposal_facility.description: GLN or identifier of disposal facility

EntityHistory.description: EPCIS-compatible base event structure for complete lifecycle audit trail of products, materials, batches, or commodities

action.description: Uses EPCIS Action vocabulary directly - ADD OBSERVE DELETE

biz_location.description: Business location where objects are expected following event EPCIS bizLocation

certification_info.description: URI references to relevant certification documents or standards

disposition.description: Business state of objects - aligns with EPCIS disposition concept

error_declaration.description: Declaration that this event is in error EPCIS errorDeclaration

event_identifier.description: Unique identifier for each event - aligns with EPCIS eventID concept

event_location.description: GLN or URI for location - aligns with EPCIS readPoint/bizLocation concepts

event_time_zone_offset.description: Time zone offset from UTC like +01:00 or -05:00

event_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp with timezone - aligns with EPCIS eventTime concept

event_type.description: Uses EPCIS EventType vocabulary directly - ObjectEvent TransactionEvent etc

linked_entity_identifier.description: EPC URI, GTIN plus serial, batch number, or lot identifier for the tracked entity (product, material, batch, commodity) - aligns with EPCIS epcList concept

linked_entity_identifier_value.description: Value holder for linked entity identifier

read_point.description: Specific location where event occurred EPCIS readPoint

sensor_metadata.description: IoT sensor data using EPCIS 2.0 SensorReport structure

EntityHistory.title: EntityHistory

ErrorDeclaration.description: Declaration that an event was recorded in error EPCIS errorDeclaration

corrective_event_ids.description: IDs of events that correct this error

corrective_event_ids_value.description: Value holder for corrective event IDs

ErrorDeclaration.title: ErrorDeclaration

IncidentTypeEnum.description: Types of supply chain incidents and exceptions
IncidentTypeEnum.title: IncidentTypeEnum

stop_duration.description: Stop duration in ISO 8601 format (e.g. PT2H30M for 2 hours 30 minutes)

stop_location.description: UN/LOCODE or GLN of stop location

LogisticsEvents.description: Supply chain transportation tracking post-import - aligns with EPCIS ObjectEvent concepts

route_information.description: Planned route using GS1 route information structure

shipment_identifier.description: Unique shipment reference carrier tracking number

transport_conditions.description: Transport conditions using EPCIS 2.0 SensorReport for temperature humidity shock

transport_mode.description: Mode of transport using UN/ECE Recommendation 19 codes

LogisticsEvents.title: LogisticsEvents

OwnershipEvent.description: Legal ownership and custody transfers extending EPCIS TransactionEvent

chain_of_custody_reference_value.description: Value holder for custody chain references

currency.description: Currency code for transfer value using ISO 4217 standard

linked_entity_identifier.description: Reference to entities (products, materials, batches, commodities) being transferred - aligns with EPCIS epcList concept

linked_entity_identifier_value.description: Value holder for linked entity identifier

new_owner.description: Destination party GLN - aligns with EPCIS destination concept

ownership_documentation.description: Digital references EPCIS bizTransactionList URIs to documents

ownership_status.description: Legal status of ownership after transfer DPP extension beyond EPCIS

previous_owner.description: Source party GLN - aligns with EPCIS source concept

quantity_transferred.description: Quantity transferred using EPCIS QuantityElement structure

transfer_date.description: Precise timestamp of ownership change - aligns with EPCIS eventTime concept

transfer_location.description: Physical location GLN - aligns with EPCIS bizLocation concept

transfer_type.description: Uses CBV Business Transaction Type vocabulary directly - po desadv inv rma etc

transfer_value_value.description: Value holder for transfer monetary value

OwnershipEvent.title: OwnershipEvent

OwnershipStatusEnum.description: Legal status of ownership - DPP extension beyond EPCIS standard
OwnershipStatusEnum.title: OwnershipStatusEnum

PackagingLevelEnum.description: Levels in packaging hierarchy - aligns with EPCIS packaging concepts
PackagingLevelEnum.title: PackagingLevelEnum

RefurbishmentEvent.description: Entity (product, material, component) repair and refurbishment details

refurbishment_certification.description: URI reference to refurbishment quality certification or standard

ReturnMethodEnum.description: How product was returned - DPP specific
ReturnMethodEnum.title: ReturnMethodEnum

ReturnReasonEnum.description: Reasons for product return - DPP specific

ReverseLogistics.description: End-of-life and return pathway management beyond EPCIS scope

recycling_event.description: Material and product recovery and recycling processes

return_event_identifier_value.description: Value holder for return event identifier

return_initiation_date_value.description: Value holder for return initiation date

SupplyChainIncidents.description: Exception events and disruptions during supply chain operations

affected_entities.description: EPCs, GTINs, batch numbers, or lot identifiers of affected entities (products, materials, batches, commodities)

corrective_actions.description: Actions taken to resolve or mitigate

estimated_impact.description: Estimated financial impact using ISO monetary amount structure

incident_documentation.description: URI references to incident reports insurance claims photos

incident_location.description: GLN or UN/LOCODE where incident happened

linked_event_ids.description: IDs of related supply chain events

linked_event_ids_value.description: Value holder for linked event IDs

reporter_identifier.description: GLN or identifier of entity reporting the incident

ValueAddingActivityLocation.description: Transformation and processing events extending EPCIS TransformationEvent

activity_date.description: When activity occurred - aligns with EPCIS eventTime concept

activity_identifier.description: Unique activity reference - aligns with EPCIS eventID concept

activity_type.description: Uses CBV BizStep vocabulary directly - commissioning transformation decommissioning

batch_identifier.description: Batch or lot number for this processing run

facility_identifier.description: GLN or OSID of processing facility

input_entities.description: Input entities (components, materials, batches, commodities) consumed in transformation - aligns with EPCIS inputEPCList

operator_identifier.description: GLN or ID of operator performing activity

output_entities.description: Output entities (products, materials, batches, commodities) resulting from transformation - aligns with EPCIS outputEPCList

process_certification.description: URI references to process certifications ISO standards or quality systems

process_description.description: Detailed transformation process description EPCIS extension

process_duration.description: Process duration in ISO 8601 format (e.g. PT30M for 30 minutes)

process_step.description: Specific process step within transformation EPCIS bizStep

quality_check_performed.description: Whether quality control was performed DPP extension

quality_check_performed_value.description: Value holder for quality check flag

quality_check_results.description: Quality control test results DPP extension

value_added.description: Economic value added by this activity DPP extension
